long_description: This women's E-Gel saddle is the ultimate choice if comfort is your number one concern. Its shape and shock-absorbing system provide maximum support. Dual Density Technology features multiple levels of support that maximize comfort. A firm foundation and rubber inserts molded into the seat's base absorb shock. Soft, open-cell padding merges to denser closed-cell padding to provide a smooth ride. Reactive-gel top layer adds extra comfort. A deep center groove alleviates pressure. Designed for women, with a slightly wider back to accommodate wider pelvic bones and a slightly shorter nose.
short_description: This women's E-Gel saddle is the ultimate choice if comfort is your number one concern. Its shape and shock-absorbing system provide maximum support.
